short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A JavaScript utility for quality assurances on webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Measure the spacing and styles between elements on webpage. Hold down Alt(Windows) / ⌥ Option (Mac) key, move the cursor and click.

How to use:
1. Hold down Alt(Windows) / ⌥ Option (Mac) key，Move the mouse cursor to one element and Show the infomation of the element .
2. Hold down Alt(Windows) / ⌥ Option (Mac) key，Click and Move the mouse cursor to another element.
